name: Kern Media
description:
Kern Media is a Denver SEO company that provides "white hat" SEO consulting which is more akin to real marketing than SEO voodoo. Dan Kern (Founder & Principal Consultant) brings a unique blend of technical SEO capabilities, content marketing expertise and fun working relationships in order to achieve stellar results for companies looking to increase organic search traffic and grow revenue.
Dan as optimized over 300 websites and brings over 10 years of experience, both on the agency side and as a previous in-house Director of SEO. He can help with E-Commerce, lead generation, and SEO training for online publishers and companies with large staffs.
READ MORE...
